faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.introduction: Find answers to the most common questions about ScanPro. Tap on a category to see related questions and tap on a question to view the answer.
faq.contact_support: If you can't find the answer to your question here, please contact our support team.

what_is_scanpro.question: What is ScanPro?
what_is_scanpro.answer: ScanPro is a powerful document scanning application that allows you to convert physical documents, receipts, ID cards, and photos into high-quality digital files. With advanced features like PDF compression, OCR text recognition, and cloud backup options, ScanPro helps you organize and manage all your important documents in one place.

platforms.question: Which platforms is ScanPro available on?
platforms.answer: ScanPro is currently available for iOS and Android devices. We're continuously working on expanding to other platforms.

free_to_use.question: Is ScanPro free to use?
free_to_use.answer: ScanPro offers both free and premium features. Basic scanning and document management is available for free, while advanced features like cloud backup, OCR, and batch processing may require a premium subscription.

how_to_scan.question: How do I scan a document?
how_to_scan.answer:
To scan a document:
1. Open ScanPro and tap the "Scan" button on the home screen
2. Position your camera over the document
3. The app will automatically detect edges and capture the image
4. You can then crop, adjust, and enhance the scan before saving

scan_types.question: What types of documents can I scan?
scan_types.answer:
ScanPro can scan various documents including:
- Regular paper documents
- Receipts
- ID cards and passports
- Photos
- Business cards
- Whiteboards
- Books and magazines

organize_documents.question: How do I organize my scanned documents?
organize_documents.answer:
ScanPro offers a folder system to help you organize documents. You can:
- Create custom folders with different colors and icons
- Move documents between folders
- Add tags to documents for easy searching
- Mark important documents as favorites

edit_documents.question: Can I edit documents after scanning?
edit_documents.answer:
Yes, ScanPro offers various editing tools:
- Crop and rotate pages
- Enhance text and image quality
- Add or remove pages
- Reorder pages in multi-page documents
- Add text notes and annotations

multiple_pages.question: How do I scan multiple pages into a single document?
multiple_pages.answer:
When in scanning mode:
1. Capture the first page
2. Tap "Add Page" to scan additional pages
3. Continue adding pages as needed
4. Once finished, tap "Save" to create a multi-page document

file_formats.question: What file formats does ScanPro support?
file_formats.answer: ScanPro primarily saves documents as PDF files for maximum compatibility. You can also export scans as JPEG or PNG images if needed.

share_documents.question: How do I share documents from ScanPro?
share_documents.answer:
You can share documents by:
1. Opening the document you want to share
2. Tapping the share icon in the toolbar
3. Selecting your preferred sharing method (email, messaging apps, cloud services)

password_protection.question: Can I password-protect my documents?
password_protection.answer: Yes, ScanPro allows you to add password protection to sensitive PDF documents. Just open the document, tap the menu button, and select "Add Password."

compress_pdf.question: How do I compress PDF files?
compress_pdf.answer:
To compress a PDF:
1. Open the document you want to compress
2. Tap the menu button and select "Compress PDF"
3. Choose your desired compression level (low, medium, high, or maximum)
4. The app will create a compressed copy of your document

backup_documents.question: How do I back up my documents?
backup_documents.answer:
ScanPro offers several backup options:
- Local device backup
- Google Drive backup

To create a backup:
1. Go to Settings > Backup & Restore
2. Select your preferred backup destination
3. Tap "Create Backup"

backup_frequency.question: How often should I back up my documents?
backup_frequency.answer: We recommend setting up automatic backups on a regular schedule (daily, weekly, or monthly) to ensure your documents are always protected.

restore_documents.question: How do I restore my documents from a backup?
restore_documents.answer:
To restore from a backup:
1. Go to Settings > Backup & Restore
2. Switch to the "Restore" tab
3. Select your backup source
4. Choose the backup you want to restore
5. Confirm the restoration process

ocr.question: What is OCR and how do I use it?
ocr.answer:
OCR (Optical Character Recognition) is a feature that extracts text from scanned images, making the text searchable and editable. To use OCR:
1. Enable OCR in the scan settings before scanning a document
2. Alternatively, open an existing document, tap the menu button, and select "Extract Text"

merge_pdfs.question: Can I merge multiple PDF documents?
merge_pdfs.answer:
Yes, ScanPro allows you to merge multiple PDFs:
1. Go to the Tools section and select "Merge PDFs"
2. Select the documents you want to combine
3. Arrange them in your preferred order
4. Tap "Merge" to create a new combined document

edge_detection.question: The app isn't detecting document edges properly. What should I do?
edge_detection.answer:
For better edge detection:
- Ensure good lighting conditions
- Place the document against a contrasting background
- Keep the camera steady and parallel to the document
- Try switching to manual mode if automatic detection fails

blurry_text.question: My scanned text is blurry. How can I improve it?
blurry_text.answer:
To improve text clarity:
- Ensure adequate lighting
- Hold the camera steady
- Use the "Text Enhancement" option in the editing tools
- For important documents, consider using a higher scan quality setting

ocr_issues.question: I'm having trouble with the OCR feature. Any suggestions?
ocr_issues.answer:
For better OCR results:
- Ensure the document is well-lit and clearly visible
- Use the text enhancement feature before OCR
- For non-English text, make sure you've selected the correct language in settings
- Remember that OCR works best with typed text rather than handwriting

lost_scans.question: The app crashed and I lost my scans. Can I recover them?
lost_scans.answer: ScanPro creates temporary backups of recent scans. Try restarting the app to see if your scans appear in the "Recent" section. If not, check if you have automatic backups enabled and restore from your last backup.

data_security.question: Is my data secure in ScanPro?
data_security.answer:
Yes, ScanPro prioritizes your privacy and security:
- Documents are stored locally on your device by default
- Password-protected PDFs use strong encryption
- Cloud backups use secure connections
- We do not access or analyze the content of your documents

cloud_storage.question: Does ScanPro send my documents to the cloud?
cloud_storage.answer: ScanPro only sends your documents to cloud services when you explicitly choose to back up or share them. By default, all documents remain on your device.

sensitive_documents.question: How do I ensure maximum security for sensitive documents?
sensitive_documents.answer:
For sensitive documents, we recommend:
- Using the password protection feature
- Enabling biometric authentication in app settings
- Being selective about which documents you include in cloud backups
- Regularly checking which apps have access to your cloud storage services

change_language.question: How do I change the language in ScanPro?
change_language.answer:
To change the language:
1. Go to Settings
2. Tap "Language"
3. Select your preferred language from the list
4. The app will automatically restart with the new language

dark_mode.question: Can I use dark mode?
dark_mode.answer:
Yes, ScanPro supports both light and dark modes. You can:
1. Go to Settings > Appearance
2. Toggle "Dark Mode" on or off
3. Alternatively, set it to follow your system settings

biometric_auth.question: How do I enable biometric authentication?
biometric_auth.answer:
To enable biometric authentication:
1. Go to Settings > Security
2. Toggle "Biometric Authentication" on
3. Complete the authentication process as prompted by your device

getting_started.home_screen_desc: The home screen is your central hub for accessing all features of the app.

features.recent_docs: Recent Documents - Quick access to your recently viewed or edited documents.
features.scan_button: Scan Button - Tap to start scanning a new document.
features.folders: Folders - Organize your documents in custom folders.
features.search: Search - Find your documents quickly by name or content.

getting_started.tip: Tip: You can customize your home screen layout in the settings menu to show your most frequently used features.

scan_methods.home_button: Tap the large scan button on the home screen to quickly start a new scan.
scan_methods.plus_button: Use the plus button in the bottom navigation bar for scanning options.
scan_methods.folder_scan: Open a folder and tap the scan button to save directly to that folder.

modes.auto: Automatically detects document edges and enhances the image quality for best results.
modes.manual: Gives you full control over the cropping, enhancement, and other settings.
modes.batch: Scan multiple pages in succession without having to tap the scan button each time.

document_scanning.settings_desc: Customize your scanning experience with the following settings:

settings.color_mode: Choose between color, grayscale, or black & white for your scans.
settings.document_type: Select from document, receipt, ID card, or photo to optimize processing.
settings.edge_detection: Enable or disable automatic edge detection for document boundaries.
settings.ocr: Turn on Optical Character Recognition to make your document text searchable.
settings.quality: Adjust the resolution from low (faster) to high (better quality).

reviewing_options.crop: Adjust the cropping boundaries to properly frame your document.
reviewing_options.rotate: Rotate the scan 90°, 180°, or 270° to correct orientation.
reviewing_options.filters: Apply color corrections, contrast adjustments, or other enhancements.
reviewing_options.retake: Discard and retake a poor scan if needed.
reviewing_options.add_pages: Add more pages to create a multi-page document.
reviewing_options.rearrange: Drag and drop to reorder pages in a multi-page document.

document_scanning.tip: Tip: For best results, scan in a well-lit environment with the document on a contrasting background.

document_management.library_desc: The document library shows all your scanned and imported documents.

library_features.view: View all documents or filter by folders, favorites, or document type.
library_features.sort: Sort documents by name, date, size, or custom order.
library_features.filter: Filter documents by tags, type, or other criteria.
library_features.search: Search for documents by name or content (if OCR is enabled).

document_management.actions_desc: For each document, you can perform the following actions:

doc_actions.view: Open and view the document with zoom and scroll options.
doc_actions.rename: Change the document name for better organization.
doc_actions.edit: Modify the document content, crop, or apply filters.
doc_actions.share: Share the document via email, messaging, or other apps.
doc_actions.move: Move the document to a different folder.
doc_actions.favorite: Mark frequently used documents as favorites for quick access.
doc_actions.delete: Remove documents you no longer need.

document_management.recents_desc: The app keeps track of your recently accessed documents for quick access.
document_management.tip: Tip: Use tags to categorize your documents for easier searching and filtering later.

creating_steps.step1: Tap the folder icon in the navigation bar to access the folders view.
creating_steps.step2: Tap the '+' button to create a new folder.
creating_steps.step3: Enter a name for your folder and select a color for easy identification.
creating_steps.step4: Tap 'Create' to save your new folder.

organization.subfolders_desc: You can create a hierarchical structure with folders and subfolders:

subfolder_features.create: In a folder view, tap '+' and select 'Create Subfolder' to add a subfolder.
subfolder_features.content: Subfolders can contain documents just like regular folders.
subfolder_features.navigate: Tap on a folder to view its contents, including any subfolders.

moving_steps.step1: Long-press on a document to enter selection mode.
moving_steps.step2: Select one or more documents you want to move.
moving_steps.step3: Tap the 'Move' button in the action bar.
moving_steps.step4: Choose the destination folder and confirm.

organization.managing_desc: You can perform various actions on your folders:

folder_actions.rename: Change a folder's name or color to better fit your organizational scheme.
folder_actions.delete: Remove a folder and optionally decide what to do with its contents.
folder_actions.move: Change a folder's position in the hierarchy by moving it to become a subfolder of another folder.

organization.tip: Tip: Create folders that match your document categories such as 'Bills', 'Receipts', 'Work', or 'Personal'.

editing.enhancement_desc: Improve the quality and readability of your scanned documents:

enhancement_tools.auto: One-tap enhancement to automatically optimize brightness, contrast, and clarity.
enhancement_tools.brightness: Manually adjust brightness and contrast for better readability.
enhancement_tools.color: Fine-tune colors, saturation, and white balance.
enhancement_tools.noise: Remove specks, dots, and other imperfections from scans.

editing.editing_desc: Make changes to your document's content and appearance:

editing_tools.crop: Resize, crop, or rotate pages to get the perfect alignment and aspect ratio.
editing_tools.ocr: Extract text from your documents to make them searchable and editable.
editing_tools.text: Edit recognized text directly in the app for minor corrections.
editing_tools.annotate: Add highlights, underlines, notes, or redactions to important sections.

page_actions.add: Add more pages to an existing document.
page_actions.rearrange: Change the order of pages by dragging and dropping.
page_actions.extract: Save a specific page as a separate document.

editing.tip: Tip: For documents with small text, try scanning at a higher resolution and then using text enhancement options for better readability.

pdf_tools.creating_desc: There are several ways to create PDF files in the app:

creating_methods.scan: Scan physical documents directly to PDF format.
creating_methods.combine: Combine multiple scans into a single PDF document.
creating_methods.images: Convert images from your gallery into PDF format.
creating_methods.import: Import existing PDF files from your device or cloud storage.

pdf_tools.compression_desc: Reduce file size while maintaining necessary quality:

compression_levels.low: Minimal compression with high image quality, best for documents with fine details or images.
compression_levels.medium: Balanced compression with good quality, suitable for most documents.
compression_levels.high: High compression with reduced quality, ideal for email attachments or documents where quality is less critical.

pdf_tools.operations_desc: Perform various actions on your PDF files:

pdf_operations.merge: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document.
pdf_operations.split: Divide a PDF into multiple smaller documents.
pdf_operations.extract: Save specific pages as separate files.
pdf_operations.rearrange: Change the order of pages within a PDF.

conversion_options.images: Export PDF pages as image files (JPG, PNG).
conversion_options.text: Extract plain text from PDF documents.
conversion_options.formats: Convert to and from various formats like DOCX, XLSX, or HTML.

pdf_tools.tip: Tip: When sharing PDFs by email, use the medium or high compression level to reduce file size while keeping the document readable.

security.app_security_desc: Protect access to the app and all your documents:

app_security_features.biometric: Use fingerprint or face recognition to unlock the app.
app_security_features.pin: Set a numeric PIN code as an alternative authentication method.
app_security_features.auto_lock: Configure the app to automatically lock after a period of inactivity.

security.encryption_desc: Secure individual documents with password protection:

encryption_features.password: Set a password for sensitive documents to prevent unauthorized access.
encryption_features.change: Update passwords for documents that already have protection.
encryption_features.remove: Remove password protection when it's no longer needed.

security.private_folder_desc: Store your most sensitive documents in a specially protected location:

private_folder_features.auth: Requires additional authentication to access, even if the app is already unlocked.
private_folder_features.hidden: Keeps documents invisible from the main library view.
private_folder_features.biometric: Offers biometric protection for maximum security.

security.practices_desc: Follow these guidelines to keep your documents secure:

security_practices.strong_passwords: Use strong, unique passwords for document protection.
security_practices.biometric: Enable biometric authentication for the most secure access.
security_practices.backup: Regularly back up your documents to prevent loss.
security_practices.sharing: Be cautious when sharing sensitive documents.

security.tip: Tip: For highly sensitive documents, use both app-level security and document-level password protection for multiple layers of security.

import_export.importing_desc: Add existing documents to your library from various sources:

import_methods.gallery: Select images from your device's photo gallery.
import_methods.pdf: Import PDF files from your device storage.
import_methods.cloud: Access documents from cloud storage services like Google Drive or Dropbox.
import_methods.apps: Receive documents shared from other applications.

import_export.exporting_desc: Share your documents with others or other applications:

export_methods.pdf: Export documents as PDF files for universal compatibility.
export_methods.images: Save document pages as individual image files.
export_methods.options: Choose from various quality and format options depending on your needs.
export_methods.batch: Export multiple documents at once in a batch operation.

import_export.backup_desc: Safeguard your documents against loss or device changes:

backup_methods.local: Create backups stored on your device's storage.
backup_methods.cloud: Sync your documents to cloud storage for access across devices.
backup_methods.auto: Set up automatic backups on a regular schedule.
backup_methods.restore: Recover your documents from a previous backup when needed.

import_export.tip: Tip: Create regular backups of your documents, especially before updating the app or changing devices, to ensure you never lose important information.

settings.appearance_desc: Customize how the app looks and feels:

appearance_settings.theme: Switch between light and dark themes or follow system settings.
appearance_settings.language: Choose your preferred language from the available options.
appearance_settings.layout: Customize the layout of the home screen and document list.

settings.scanning_desc: Configure default behavior for document scanning:

scanning_settings.mode: Set the default scanning mode (Auto, Manual, or Batch).
scanning_settings.color: Choose the default color mode for new scans.
scanning_settings.enhancement: Enable or disable automatic image enhancement.
scanning_settings.quality: Set the default resolution for document scanning.

settings.document_desc: Manage how documents are handled and stored:

document_settings.location: Choose where documents are saved on your device.
document_settings.quality: Set the default quality level for PDF creation.
document_settings.ocr: Configure OCR language and performance options.

settings.security_desc: Protect your documents and app access:

security_settings.biometric: Enable or disable fingerprint or face recognition unlock.
security_settings.pin: Set up or change your PIN code.
security_settings.auto_lock: Configure how quickly the app locks after inactivity.

settings.backup_desc: Configure how your documents are backed up:

backup_settings.content: Select which content is included in backups.

settings.tip: Tip: Visit the settings menu regularly to check for new options and features as the app is updated.

scanning_solutions.quality: If scans appear blurry, ensure good lighting and hold the camera steady, or try using a higher quality setting.
scanning_solutions.edges: If edge detection isn't working properly, try placing the document on a contrasting background or switch to manual mode.
scanning_solutions.ocr: For OCR problems, ensure the text is clear and well-lit, and check that you've selected the correct language.
scanning_solutions.camera: If the camera won't focus or open, check your permissions settings and restart the app or device.

troubleshooting.management_solutions_desc: Resolving problems with your document library:

management_solutions.missing: If documents are missing, check different folders, use the search function, or restore from a backup.
management_solutions.open: If a document won't open, it might be corrupted - try importing it again or recovering from a backup.
management_solutions.performance: If the app feels slow, try clearing the cache in settings or restarting your device.
management_solutions.storage: If you're running out of space, use the compression feature on PDFs or delete unnecessary documents.

support_options.help: Check the in-app help section for guides and FAQs.
support_options.email: Contact our support team via email for personalized assistance.
support_options.knowledge: Browse our online knowledge base for solutions to common problems.
support_options.feedback: Submit feature requests or bug reports to help us improve the app.

troubleshooting.tip: Tip: Before contacting support, try restarting the app and your device, as this can resolve many common issues.
